### Notes on the numbers

Some points worth remembering

- All original gambit-related stats and awards were inaccurate due to my use of poor (incomplete) gambit data. I've now fixed this and corrected all relevant stats in the 4545 season reports, but I've yet to update most LoneWolf season reports.

- The [match visualisations](https://rahulan-c.github.io/lichess4545-stats/current.html) reflect the results of matches and games at the time they were produced (which, helpfully, isn't recorded anywhere). Just pointing this out because match/game results *can* be changed - eg if a player gets booted from the league and has to forfeit games - which won't be captured in these PDFs unless they're re-done.
